name: Bulbasaur
description: It can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

name: Ivysaur
description: There is a bud on this Pokémon’s back. To support its weight, It’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.

name: Venusaur
description: There is a large flower on It’s back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.

name: Charmander
description: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when It is enjoying itself. If the Pokémon becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.

name: Charmeleon
description: It mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.

name: Charizard
description: It flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.

name: Squirtle
description: It’s shell is not merely used for protection. The shell’s rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this Pokémon to swim at high speeds.

name: Wartortle
description: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as It ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon’s toughness as a battler.

name: Blastoise
description: It has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

name: Weedle
description: It has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

name: Kakuna
description: It remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

name: Beedrill
description: It is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.

name: Pidgey
description: It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

name: Pidgeot
description: This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling them to choose It as their Pokémon.

name: Rattata
description: Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life. If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.

name: Raticate
description: People say that it fled from its enemies by using its small webbed hind feet to swim from island to island in Alola.

name: Arbok
description: The latest research has determined that there are over 20 possible arrangements of the patterns on its stomach.

name: Pikachu
description: Its nature is to store up electricity. Forests where nests of It live are dangerous, since the trees are so often struck by lightning.

name: Raichu
description: As electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes more aggressive. One theory is that the electricity buildup is actually causing stress.

name: Raichu
description: It focuses psychic energy into its tail and rides it like it’s surfing. Another name for this Pokémon is “hodad.”

name: Sandslash
description: It runs across snow-covered plains at high speeds. It developed thick, sharp claws to plow through the snow.

name: Nidoran♀
description: It has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.

name: Nidorina
description: When It are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This Pokémon appears to become nervous if separated from the others.

name: Nidoqueen
description: It’s body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.

name: Clefairy
description: They’re popular, but they’re rare. Trainers who show them off recklessly may be targeted by thieves.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Recordings of It’s strange lullabies can be purchased from department stores. These CDs can be found near the bedding area.

name: Zubat
description: It has no eyeballs, so it can’t see. It checks its surroundings via the ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.

name: Golbat
description: Every once in a while, you’ll see a It that’s missing some fangs. This happens when hunger drives it to try biting a Steel-type Pokémon.

name: Vileplume
description: It’s toxic pollen triggers atrocious allergy attacks. That’s why it is advisable never to approach any attractive flowers in a jungle, however pretty they may be.

name: Venonat
description: It is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large eyes that never fail to spot even minuscule prey.

name: Venomoth
description: It is nocturnal—it is a Pokémon that only becomes active at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.

name: Dugtrio
description: Its metallic whiskers are heavy, so it’s not very fast, but it has the power to dig through bedrock.

name: Meowth
description: When visiting a junkyard, you may catch sight of it having an intense fight with Murkrow over shiny objects.

name: Persian
description: This Pokémon is popular with rich people. It’s also targeted by hunters who are after the jewel in its forehead.

name: Persian
description: In contrast to its lovely face, it’s so brutal that it tortures its weakened prey rather than finishing them off.

name: Psyduck
description: Using psychokinesis gives it a headache, so it normally passes the time spacing out and doing as little as possible.

name: Growlithe
description: While it’s quite friendly toward humans once it’s grown used to them, in the wild it must be quite fierce to defend its territory from Rockruff.

name: Arcanine
description: Legends tell of its fighting alongside a general and conquering a whole country.

name: Alakazam
description: It uses its psychic powers to make the spoons it carries. Each spoon is an original that there’s only one of in the whole world.

name: Machop
description: Once this Pokémon has gained enough confidence and muscle from training with its friends, it challenges Makuhita to a battle.

name: Machamp
description: It grasps its opponents with its four arms and twists them up in an intricate hold. People call it “the It special.”

name: Bellsprout
description: It’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

name: Weepinbell
description: It has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the Pokémon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.

name: Victreebel
description: It has a long vine that extends from its head. This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near, this Pokémon swallows it whole.

name: Geodude
description: It that have lived a long life have had all their edges smoothed out until they’re totally round. They also have a calm, quiet disposition.

name: Geodude
description: If you mistake it for a rock and step on it, it will headbutt you in anger. In addition to the pain, it will also zap you with a shock.

name: Graveler
description: It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward the peak of a mountain. As soon as it reaches the summit, it rolls back down the way it came.

name: Graveler
description: When two It fight each other, it fills the surroundings with flashes of light and sound. People call it the “fireworks of the earth.”

name: Golem
description: When It grow old, they stop shedding their shells. Those that have lived a long, long time have shells green with moss.

name: Ponyta
description: It is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. This Pokémon becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to keep up with its parent.

name: Rapidash
description: It usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this Pokémon turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.

name: Magnemite
description: It’s frequently the cause of power outages, which is why some power plants send out electrical signals that it can’t stand.

name: Seel
description: Thanks to its thick fat, cold seas don’t bother it at all, but it gets tired pretty easily in warm waters.

name: Dewgong
description: It swims through the ocean at a speed of eight knots, searching for Pokémon that will become its prey. It’s especially fond of Wishiwashi.

name: Grimer
description: It was born from sludge on the ocean floor. In a sterile environment, the germs within its body can’t multiply, and it dies.

name: Muk
description: Their food sources have decreased, and their numbers have declined sharply. Sludge ponds are being built to prevent their extinction.

name: Haunter
description: On moonless nights, It searches for someone to curse, so it’s best not to go out walking around.

name: Gengar
description: You can hear tales told all over the world about how It will pay a visit to children who are naughty.

name: Onix
description: It has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this Pokémon does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.

name: Voltorb
description: It was first sighted at a company that manufactures Poké Balls. The link between that sighting and the fact that this Pokémon looks very similar to a Poké Ball remains a mystery.

name: Electrode
description: It eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this Pokémon exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.

name: Exeggcute
description: Six of them form a single Pokémon. Should one of the six be lost, the next morning there will once more be six.

name: Marowak
description: The rich greenery of the Alola region is hard on It. It controls fire to stay alive.

name: Weezing
description: It loves the gases given off by rotted kitchen garbage. This Pokémon will find a dirty, unkempt house and make it its home. At night, when the people in the house are asleep, it will go through the trash.

name: Tangela
description: It’s vines snap off easily if they are grabbed. This happens without pain, allowing it to make a quick getaway. The lost vines are replaced by newly grown vines the very next day.

name: Goldeen
description: Although known for their splendid tail fins, It apparently compete among themselves to see whose horn is thickest and sharpest.

name: Seaking
description: Its horn spins like a drill to steadily hollow out rocks—even harder ones. The coloration of the male is more vivid.

name: Starmie
description: Its sparkling core is called “the gem of the sea.” This core can be made into high-priced accessories that are traded in secret.

name: Scyther
description: Its two sharp scythes are more than just weapons. It uses them with dexterity to dress its prey before eating.

name: Pinsir
description: Although it’s tough, it can’t handle cold well. When night falls, it buries itself in leafage and sleeps.

name: Tauros
description: They live in groups. The one with the longest, thickest, and most-scarred horns is the boss of the herd.

name: Gyarados
description: It fires hyper beams in all directions, burning the surrounding area to ash. There are some regions where it’s called “the deity of destruction.”

name: Lapras
description: They’ve been so cherished that there’s now an overabundance. The fish Pokémon population has declined in waters with too many It.

name: Eevee
description: The question of why only It has such unstable genes has still not been solved.

name: Kabuto
description: This Pokémon thrived 300 million years ago. It’s said that living specimens can still be seen in a certain region—a rare sight.

name: Kabutops
description: Its body had begun to change so it could function on land. But it didn’t adapt in time and went extinct.

name: Aerodactyl
description: Restored from DNA found in amber, this Pokémon exhibited ferocity that was greater than expected. Some casualties resulted.

name: Dratini
description: It’s still weak, so it lurks on the floor of bodies of water, eating whatever food sinks down and living a quiet life.

name: Dragonite
description: It flies over raging seas as if they were nothing. Observing this, a ship’s captain dubbed this Pokémon “the sea incarnate.”

name: Mewtwo
description: It is a Pokémon that was created by genetic manipulation. However, even though the scientific power of humans created this Pokémon’s body, they failed to endow It with a compassionate heart.

name: Mew
description: It is said to possess the genetic composition of all Pokémon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.

name: Mew
description: It is said to possess the genetic composition of all Pokémon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.

name: Chikorita
description: In battle, It waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.

name: Bayleef
description: It’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.

name: Meganium
description: The fragrance of It’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.

name: Cyndaquil
description: It protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if it is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.

name: Quilava
description: It keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This Pokémon applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.

name: Typhlosion
description: It obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokémon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

name: Totodile
description: Despite the smallness of its body, It’s jaws are very powerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.

name: Croconaw
description: Once It has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.

name: Feraligatr
description: It intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.

name: Spinarak
description: With threads from its mouth, it fashions sturdy webs that won’t break even if you set a rock on them.

name: Ariados
description: Every night, it wanders around in search of prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing threads before it bites into them with its fangs.

name: Crobat
description: Its fangs are so sharp, if it bites you in the dark and sucks your blood, you won’t notice any pain or realize you’ve been bitten.

name: Togepi
description: As its energy, It uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokémon. This Pokémon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell, then shares them with others.

name: Xatu
description: It’s said that while this Pokémon has the power to predict the future, it’s not powerful enough to change the future it sees.

name: Marill
description: It’s oil-filled tail acts much like a life preserver. If you see just its tail bobbing on the water’s surface, it’s a sure indication that this Pokémon is diving beneath the water to feed on aquatic plants.

name: Hoppip
description: This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, It links its leaves with other It to prepare against being blown away.

name: Skiploom
description: It’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémon is sometimes used as a thermometer.

name: Jumpluff
description: It rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.

name: Umbreon
description: This Pokémon is nocturnal. Even in total darkness, its large eyes can spot its prey clearly!

name: Steelix
description: It lives even further underground than Onix. This Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth’s core. There are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.

name: Granbull
description: While it has powerful jaws, it doesn’t care for disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display their might.

name: Slugma
description: Molten magma courses throughout It’s circulatory system. If this Pokémon is chilled, the magma cools and hardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducing its size.

name: Octillery
description: The ink it spits when escaping is special. It contains a substance that dulls the sense of smell, so Pokémon with keen noses get lost.

name: Delibird
description: It shares its food with people who are stranded. Because It is omnivorous, sometimes it gives those people bug Pokémon.

name: Houndoom
description: They spew flames mixed with poison to finish off their opponents. They divvy up their prey evenly among the members of their pack.

name: Kingdra
description: It lives at extreme ocean depths that are otherwise uninhabited. It has long been believed that the yawning of this Pokémon creates spiraling ocean currents.

name: Phanpy
description: For its nest, It digs a vertical pit in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.

name: Miltank
description: It produces over five gallons of milk a day. The higher the quality of the pastures it lives in, the richer and tastier its milk becomes.

name: Blissey
description: Their eggs are such a delicacy that some say eating one will bring you happiness. These eggs fetch the highest prices on the market.

name: Entei
description: It embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.

name: Tyranitar
description: It wanders through the mountains seeking opponents to fight. If it finds an opponent that’s not worthy, It ignores it and wanders on.

name: Ho-Oh
description: It’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

name: Treecko
description: It has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This Pokémon attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.

name: Grovyle
description: The leaves growing out of It’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pokémon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.

name: Sceptile
description: The leaves growing on It’s body are very sharp edged. This Pokémon is very agile—it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.

name: Torchic
description: It sticks with its Trainer, following behind with unsteady steps. This Pokémon breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.

name: Combusken
description: It toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This Pokémon’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out 10 kicks in one second.

name: Blaziken
description: In battle, It blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this Pokémon’s wrists burn.

name: Mudkip
description: The fin on It’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this Pokémon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.

name: Marshtomp
description: The surface of It’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This Pokémon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.

name: Swampert
description: It is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This Pokémon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.

name: Poochyena
description: At first sight, It takes a bite at anything that moves. This Pokémon chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.

name: Mightyena
description: It gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.

name: Beautifly
description: It’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. It is sure to come looking for pollen.

name: Cascoon
description: It makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.

name: Dustox
description: It is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémon are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.

name: Lombre
description: It is nocturnal—it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief maker. When this Pokémon spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.

name: Nuzleaf
description: It live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. This Pokémon dislikes having its long nose pinched.

name: Swellow
description: It flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This Pokémon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by It’s clawed feet, preventing escape.

name: Pelipper
description: It places small Pokémon into its spacious beak and carries them around. No one knows where it’s taking them.

name: Gardevoir
description: It has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its Trainer, this Pokémon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.

name: Surskit
description: If it’s in a pinch, it will secrete a sweet liquid from the tip of its head. Syrup made from gathering that liquid is tasty on bread.

name: Masquerain
description: It intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns of its eyespots. If that doesn’t work, it deftly makes its escape on its set of four wings.

name: Slaking
description: It spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this Pokémon reluctantly moves to another spot.

name: Makuhita
description: It practices its slaps by repeatedly slapping tree trunks. It has been known to slap an Exeggutor and get flung away.

name: Hariyama
description: Although they enjoy comparing their strength, they’re also kind. They value etiquette, praising opponents they battle.

name: Nosepass
description: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it’s in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.

name: Meditite
description: It undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. However, whenever it meditates, this Pokémon always loses its concentration and focus. As a result, its training never ends.

name: Medicham
description: It is said that through meditation, It heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This Pokémon hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.

name: Sharpedo
description: People believe that carrying one of its discarded fangs will prevent mishaps at sea, so the fangs are made into accessories.

name: Numel
description: It is extremely dull witted—it doesn’t notice being hit. However, it can’t stand hunger for even a second. This Pokémon’s body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.

name: Torkoal
description: You can tell how it’s feeling by the smoke spouting from its shell. Tremendous velocity is a sign of good health.

name: Spoink
description: It bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this Pokémon cannot afford to stop bouncing—if it stops, its heart will stop.

name: Grumpig
description: It uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this Pokémon uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.

name: Trapinch
description: Its jaws are strong enough to crush rocks but so heavy that it can’t get up if it flips over. Sandile seize those moments as their chance.

name: Vibrava
description: It vibrates its wings to generate ultrasonic waves, causing its prey to faint. Then it buries the prey alive in the sand to preserve it.

name: Altaria
description: It dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.

name: Seviper
description: It shares a generations-long feud with Zangoose. The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This Pokémon attacks using its sword-edged tail.

name: Lunatone
description: It was discovered at a location where a meteoroid fell. As a result, some people theorize that this Pokémon came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.

name: Solrock
description: It is a new species of Pokémon that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this Pokémon releases intensely bright light.

name: Milotic
description: While It is said to be the most beautiful Pokémon, Trainers who like Feebas and have raised it are seemingly disappointed by It.

name: Dusclops
description: It’s body is completely hollow—there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This Pokémon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.

name: Absol
description: The only thing unlucky about It is its appearance. It protects fields and warns people of disaster, so one ought to be grateful for it.

name: Snorunt
description: Rich people from cold areas all share childhood memories of playing with It.

name: Glalie
description: It freezes its prey and chews them whole. However, it prefers to eat Pokémon like Vanillite that are already frozen.

name: Spheal
description: It is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this Pokémon eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.

name: Sealeo
description: It has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This Pokémon occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a Spheal on its nose.

name: Walrein
description: It’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing 10 tons with one blow. This Pokémon’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.

name: Bagon
description: Whenever it sees bird Pokémon flying through the sky, it becomes envious and smashes its surroundings to bits with headbutts.

name: Salamence
description: Overjoyed at finally being able to fly, it flies all over the place and usually doesn’t land until it’s completely exhausted and needs to sleep.

name: Metagross
description: It boasts not only psychic powers but also fantastic strength. It grabs its prey with its four legs and holds them in place with its claws.

name: Regirock
description: It was sealed away by people long ago. If this Pokémon’s body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.

name: Kyogre
description: It is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: Groudon
description: It is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: Rayquaza
description: It is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.

name: Turtwig
description: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.

name: Grotle
description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

name: Torterra
description: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic It dwelled.

name: Infernape
description: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.

name: Piplup
description: It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to bond with since it won’t listen to its Trainer.

name: Prinplup
description: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

name: Empoleon
description: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

name: Starly
description: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.

name: Staravia
description: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.

name: Staraptor
description: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.

name: Bibarel
description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

name: Luxray
description: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey—even those taking shelter behind a wall.

name: Roserade
description: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.

name: Cranidos
description: A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.

name: Rampardos
description: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.

name: Shieldon
description: A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.

name: Floatzel
description: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

name: Drifloon
description: Its round body is stuffed with souls and expands each time it leads someone away.

name: Drifblim
description: There’s a rumor that if you catch a It floating on the wind at dusk, you’ll be carried away to the afterlife.

name: Lopunny
description: It regrows its coat twice a year. Mufflers and hats made from its fur are really warm.

name: Mismagius
description: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokémon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.

name: Honchkrow
description: It will absolutely not forgive failure from or betrayal by its goons. It has no choice in this if it wants to maintain the order of the flock.

name: Bronzong
description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

name: Gible
description: It reacts to anything that moves—flies right at it and bites it. Sometimes it injures itself, but it doesn’t care too much.

name: Garchomp
description: It flies at the speed of sound while searching for prey, and it has midair battles with Salamence as the two compete for food.

name: Lucario
description: It concentrates its mental energy and fires off mysterious waves called auras, which can crush boulders of large size to dust.

name: Carnivine
description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

name: Snover
description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain’s lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.

name: Abomasnow
description: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as “The Ice Monster.”

name: Togekiss
description: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.

name: Gallade
description: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.

name: Probopass
description: Although it can control its units known as Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don’t come back.

name: Dusknoir
description: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.

name: Rotom
description: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.

name: Palkia
description: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

name: Snivy
description: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

name: Servine
description: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.

name: Serperior
description: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from It’s noble eyes.

name: Tepig
description: It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.

name: Pignite
description: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.

name: Emboar
description: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

name: Oshawott
description: The scalchop on its stomach isn’t just used for battle—it can be used to break open hard berries as well.

name: Dewott
description: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

name: Samurott
description: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.

name: Stoutland
description: Its fur is long and thick. A long time ago in cold regions, every household kept a It.

name: Purrloin
description: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.

name: Liepard
description: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.

name: Musharna
description: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

name: Zebstrika
description: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

name: Roggenrola
description: The hexagonal hole is its ear. Deep in that ear is an energy core, so if you stick your hand in there, It will be very angry!

name: Boldore
description: The energy overflowing from its body has turned into orange crystals that are hard enough to smash diamonds.

name: Gigalith
description: When it fires off energy with all its might, the power creates countless fissures on its body.

name: Excadrill
description: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

name: Conkeldurr
description: It is thought that It taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

name: Palpitoad
description: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.

name: Seismitoad
description: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.

name: Throh
description: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild It use vines to weave their own belts.

name: Sawk
description: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.

name: Leavanny
description: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.

name: Whirlipede
description: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.

name: Scolipede
description: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.

name: Cottonee
description: To protect itself, it shoots cotton from its body. When it gets wet in the rain, its cotton grows moist and heavy, and it can’t move as well.

name: Whimsicott
description: This nuisance sneaks into people’s homes, where it hides important things and scatters cotton all over the place.

name: Basculin
description: Savage, violent Pokémon, red and blue It are always fighting each other over territory.

name: Krookodile
description: When it spots prey, even at a distance of over 30 miles, it swims through the desert as if it were water, then jumps out and chomps them.

name: Sigilyph
description: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.

name: Carracosta
description: Its jaws are terrifyingly powerful. It could eat Omastar and Omanyte whole and not be bothered in the slightest by their shells.

name: Archeops
description: This ancient Pokémon’s plumage is delicate, so if anyone other than an experienced professional tries to restore it, they will fail.

name: Zorua
description: This Pokémon has a cowardly disposition, so when it’s not around friends, it basically always stays transformed as something else.

name: Zoroark
description: It doesn’t just transform itself—it also has the power to make hundreds of people see its illusions.

name: Reuniclus
description: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.

name: Swanna
description: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

name: Deerling
description: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.

name: Frillish
description: It wraps its veillike arms and legs around prey swimming by and drags them down to the depths of the ocean.

name: Klink
description: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.

name: Litwick
description: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

name: Chandelure
description: Being consumed in It’s flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.

name: Axew
description: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

name: Haxorus
description: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

name: Cryogonal
description: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.

name: Braviary
description: The more scars it has on its front, the more heroic it’s considered to be. Those with many scars on their back are mocked by the flock.

name: Deino
description: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.

name: Hydreigon
description: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.

name: Volcarona
description: As it flies, it scatters its flaming scales. It was feared by ancient people, who referred to it as “the rage of the sun.”

name: Cobalion
description: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.

name: Reshiram
description: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.

name: Zekrom
description: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.

name: Kyurem
description: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

name: Litleo
description: When they’re young, they live with a pride. Once they’re able to hunt prey on their own, they’re kicked out and have to make their own way.

name: Flabébé
description: It’s not safe without the power of a flower, but it will keep traveling around until it finds one with the color and shape it wants.

name: Fennekin
description: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Braixen
description: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

name: Delphox
description: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

name: Froakie
description: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: Frogadier
description: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

name: Greninja
description: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

name: Heliolisk
description: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single It can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.

name: Espurr
description: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

name: Meowstic
description: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

name: Pumpkaboo
description: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.

name: Amaura
description: It lived in cold areas in ancient times. It’s said that when It whinnies, auroras appear in the night sky.

name: Aurorus
description: An It was found frozen solid within a glacier, just as it appeared long ago, which became quite a big event in the news.

name: Swirlix
description: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.

name: Aegislash
description: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.

name: Avalugg
description: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.

name: Fletchling
description: While it’s an amiable Pokémon, if you touch it unexpectedly, it will heat up its body in an instant, and you’ll be burned.

name: Clawitzer
description: It compresses the water it has sucked up and then projects it with enough power to punch a hole right through a thick sheet of iron.

name: Goomy
description: It uses its horns to check out its surroundings. They’re very sensitive, so if you grab them, it will feel a strong shock and be unable to move.

name: Sylveon
description: Once a fight breaks out, it will unflinchingly charge at dragon Pokémon that are many times larger than itself.

name: Xerneas
description: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

name: Yveltal
description: When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.

name: Hoopa
description: In its true form, it possess a huge amount of power. Legends of its avarice tell how it once carried off an entire castle to gain the treasure hidden within.

name: Mareanie
description: They eat Corsola branches, so It are hated by craftsmen who work with Corsola branches that have naturally fallen off.

name: Salazzle
description: It lives deep in caves and forces the Salandit it has attracted with its pheromones to serve it.

name: Toucannon
description: They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate. The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.

name: Steenee
description: It’s protected by its hard sepals, so it plays with bird Pokémon without worry. They peck it relentlessly, but it doesn’t care.

name: Tsareena
description: A master of grand and beautiful kicks, it can knock out even kickboxing champions with a single blow.

name: Kommo-o
description: When it howls after finishing off its prey, the metallic sounds of its celebrating comrades can be heard from all around.

name: Mimikyu
description: It stands in front of a mirror, trying to fix its broken neck as if its life depended on it. It has a hard time getting it right, so it’s crying inside.

name: Palossand
description: Each of its grains of sand has its own will. It eats small Pokémon and siphons away their vital essence while they’re still alive.

name: Rockruff
description: As they develop, their disposition grows more violent and aggressive. Many Trainers find them too much to handle and abandon them.

name: Lycanroc
description: The sharp rocks in its mane can cut like knives. It wears its prey down by degrees before finishing them off.

name: Lycanroc
description: The sharp rocks in its mane can cut like knives. It wears its prey down by degrees before finishing them off.

name: Ribombee
description: Rain makes pollen damp, so It hates rain. When it sees ominous clouds, it finds a hollow in a tree, where it waits stock-still.

name: Mudsdale
description: It remains calm and unmoving no matter the situation. It mixes dirt with the saliva in its mouth to make a special kind of mud.

name: Rowlet
description: It sends its feathers, which are as sharp as blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong, so its kicks are also formidable.

name: Dartrix
description: This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean freak. If you don’t groom it diligently, it will stop listening to you.

name: Decidueye
description: It nocks its arrow quills and shoots them at opponents. When it simply can’t afford to miss, it tugs the vine on its head to improve its focus.

name: Incineroar
description: Although it’s rough mannered and egotistical, it finds beating down unworthy opponents boring. It gets motivated for stronger opponents.

name: Popplio
description: The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.

name: Brionne
description: It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesn’t know. This hard worker practices diligently until it can learn that dance.

name: Primarina
description: To It, every battle is a stage. It takes down its prey with beautiful singing and dancing.

name: Araquanid
description: It usually passes its time in the water. When its belly is full, it stores its subdued prey in the water bubble on its head.

name: Stufful
description: It boasts power enough to split large trees in half. The organ on its rear releases an odor that it uses to communicate with others of its kind.

name: Bewear
description: It waves its hands wildly in intimidation and warning. Life is over for anyone who doesn’t run away as fast as possible.

name: Turtonator
description: It lives in volcanoes and eats sulfur and other minerals. Materials from the food it eats form the basis of its explosive shell.

name: Togedemaru
description: When it’s surprised or agitated, the 14 fur spikes on its back will stand up involuntarily.

name: Crabominable
description: It stores coldness in its pincers and pummels its foes. It can even smash thick walls of ice to bits!

name: Silvally
description: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battle—just like a certain Pokémon depicted in legends.

name: Comfey
description: It stretches sticky vines out from its head and picks flowers to adorn itself with. When it doesn’t have any flowers, it feels uneasy.

name: Golisopod
description: The shell covering its body is as hard as diamond. This Pokémon will do anything it takes to win.

name: Solgaleo
description: Sometimes the result of its opening an Ultra Wormhole is that energy and life-forms from other worlds are called here to this world.

name: Lunala
description: Records of it exist in writings from long, long ago, where it was known by the name “the beast that calls the moon.”

name: Pheromosa
description: A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.

name: Inteleon
description: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.

name: Drednaw
description: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.

name: Grimmsnarl
description: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.

name: Obstagoon
description: Its voice is staggering in volume. It has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.

name: Sirfetch’d
description: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.

name: Alcremie
description: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it’s decorated with cream.

name: Morpeko
description: It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they’re precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.

name: Morpeko
description: Intense hunger drives it to extremes of violence, and the electricity in its cheek sacs has converted into a Dark-type energy.

name: Duraludon
description: The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.

name: Zacian
description: Able to cut down anything with a single strike, it became known as the Fairy King’s Sword, and it inspired awe in friend and foe alike.

name: Zamazenta
description: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master’s Shield. It was feared and respected by all.

name: Eternatus
description: It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years ago. There seems to be a connection between this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.
